mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_no, member_name, member_id, member_pw, member_birth, member_addr, member_tel, member_email, member_grade) values(memberno_seq.NEXTVAL, #{member_name}, #{member_id}, #{member_pw}, #{member_birth},#{member_addr}, #{member_tel}, #{member_email}, 'manager')
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where member_id = #{member_id}
select count(*) from member where member_email = #{member_email}
mapper.update: update member set member_pw = #{member_pw}, member_addr = #{member_addr}, member_tel=#{member_tel} where member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.delete: delete from member WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND member_pw = #{member_pw}
